page.title: 15YOUTH & COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: There is a Youth and Community Centre in Didcot. It has a wide variety of sports and leisure activities, including Yoga, Gymnastics, Netball, Football, Keep-fit, Dancing, Ballet and Needlework. In the Summer there is a Playscheme for children, which is very popular. It is called K.I.D.S.S., which stands for Kids in Didcot Summer Sheme. The Gateway Club is a club for mentally handicapped people. About 20 people help with the Club. At nearby Abingdon they may follow a Training Scheme, whereby they can earn money. About 56 people attend the Gateway Club and they all enjoy it very much. They play games at the Club. They go on trips and holidays and one of the most popular activities is acting.
